data.taskDescription:
Descripción de tareas para completar el frontend en Flutter

Completar los 9 epics del frontend de la aplicación "Pasos" (contador de pasos social) usando Flutter.

================================================================================

CONTEXTO

================================================================================

El backend ya está completo en: project-app-pasos-backend

El frontend debe ir en: project-app-pasos-frontend-flutter (crear nueva estructura)

Usar Flutter para aplicación móvil nativa multiplataforma (iOS/Android)

================================================================================

EPICS A IMPLEMENTAR

================================================================================

FLUTTER FOUNDATION

Setup de Flutter + estructura del proyecto

Configuración de dependencias base (provider/bloc, dio, etc.)

PLATFORM CONFIG

Configuración para iOS/Android

Permisos para Health APIs (HealthKit/Google Fit)

Configuración de AndroidManifest.xml y Info.plist

UI FOUNDATION

Sistema de diseño con Material Design 3

Routing y navegación (go_router)

Tema oscuro/claro (ThemeData)

Widgets reutilizables

AUTH UI

Pantallas de login, registro y recuperación de contraseña

Gestión de estado de autenticación

Almacenamiento seguro de tokens (flutter_secure_storage)

DASHBOARD

Vista principal con contador de pasos

Historial de actividad

Gráficos (fl_chart o charts_flutter)

Pull-to-refresh

SHARING UI

Lista de amigos

Gestión de compartir datos con amigos

Solicitudes de amistad

Vista de actividad de amigos

GOALS UI

Grupos y metas compartidas

Creación y edición de metas

Progreso de grupos

Rankings

NATIVE INTEGRATION

Integración con podómetro nativo usando health package

Lectura de pasos desde HealthKit (iOS)

Lectura de pasos desde Google Fit/Health Connect (Android)

Background sync de datos

REAL-TIME CLIENT

Integración WebSocket con web_socket_channel

Actualizaciones en tiempo real

Notificaciones push (firebase_messaging)

Manejo de reconexión

epics.title: Flutter Foundation - Project Setup
epics.description: Setup Flutter project structure with core dependencies including state management (Riverpod), HTTP client (Dio), secure storage, and establish the base architecture with clean separation of concerns
followsPatterns: Dependency injection with get_it or Riverpod

stories.title: Add core dependencies to pubspec.yaml
stories.description: Add flutter_riverpod, dio, flutter_secure_storage, get_it, dartz, equatable, json_annotation, json_serializable, build_runner

stories.title: Create app constants and API endpoints
stories.description: Define base URL, timeout values, storage keys, and all API endpoint paths

stories.title: Create error handling classes
stories.description: Implement AppException, Failure classes for consistent error handling across the app

stories.title: Setup Dio client with interceptors
stories.description: Configure Dio HTTP client with auth interceptor for JWT tokens and error interceptor for unified error handling

stories.title: Implement secure and local storage
stories.description: Setup flutter_secure_storage for tokens and shared_preferences for app settings

stories.title: Create data models matching backend
stories.description: Implement User, Step, SharingRelationship, GroupGoal models with JSON serialization

stories.title: Create domain entities
stories.description: Define pure Dart entities for the domain layer without external dependencies

stories.title: Implement repository pattern
stories.description: Create abstract repository interfaces and concrete implementations

stories.title: Setup dependency injection
stories.description: Configure get_it service locator with all dependencies registered

epics.title: Platform Configuration - iOS/Android Health APIs
epics.description: Configure iOS and Android platforms with necessary permissions for HealthKit and Google Fit/Health Connect, including proper manifest and plist configurations

stories.title: Configure Android permissions and Health Connect
stories.description: Add activity recognition, health permissions, and Health Connect queries to AndroidManifest.xml

stories.title: Create Android MainActivity with health permissions
stories.description: Implement MainActivity.kt to handle Health Connect permissions flow

stories.title: Configure iOS Info.plist for HealthKit
stories.description: Add NSHealthShareUsageDescription, NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription, and motion usage description

stories.title: Create iOS entitlements for HealthKit
stories.description: Add HealthKit entitlement to Runner.entitlements file

stories.title: Create platform-agnostic permission handler
stories.description: Implement abstraction layer for requesting and checking health permissions on both platforms

epics.title: UI Foundation - Design System & Navigation
epics.description: Implement Material Design 3 design system with custom theme, go_router navigation, and reusable widget library for consistent UI across the app

stories.title: Add UI dependencies
stories.description: Add go_router, google_fonts, flutter_svg, cached_network_image to pubspec.yaml

stories.title: Create color palette and theme colors
stories.description: Define AppColors with light/dark mode color schemes using Material Design 3 color system

stories.title: Create typography system
stories.description: Define AppTypography with all text styles following Material Design 3 type scale

stories.title: Create spacing and sizing constants
stories.description: Define AppSpacing with consistent padding, margin, and sizing values

stories.title: Create complete theme configuration
stories.description: Implement AppTheme with light and dark ThemeData using all design tokens

stories.title: Setup go_router with route guards
stories.description: Configure declarative routing with authentication guards and named routes

stories.title: Create base reusable widgets
stories.description: Implement AppButton, AppTextField, AppCard, AppLoading, AppError, AppEmptyState

stories.title: Create navigation widgets
stories.description: Implement AppAvatar, AppBottomNav, AppAppBar, AppSnackbar for navigation structure

stories.title: Create app shell with bottom navigation
stories.description: Implement splash page and shell page with bottom navigation structure

epics.title: Authentication UI - Login, Register, Password Recovery
epics.description: Implement complete authentication flow with login, registration, password recovery screens, authentication state management, and secure token storage with auto-refresh

stories.title: Create auth data sources
stories.description: Implement AuthRemoteDataSource for API calls and AuthLocalDataSource for token storage

stories.title: Create auth use cases
stories.description: Implement LoginUseCase, RegisterUseCase, LogoutUseCase, RefreshTokenUseCase, GetCurrentUserUseCase

stories.title: Create auth state management
stories.description: Implement AuthProvider and AuthState for managing authentication state globally

stories.title: Create login page
stories.description: Implement login page with email/password form, validation, and error handling

stories.title: Create registration page
stories.description: Implement registration page with username, email, password, confirm password, and real-time validation

stories.title: Create forgot password page
stories.description: Implement password recovery flow with email input

stories.title: Create auth helper widgets
stories.description: Implement social login buttons placeholder and other auth UI components

stories.title: Integrate auth routes
stories.description: Add auth routes to go_router and configure authentication guards

epics.title: Dashboard - Step Counter & Activity History
epics.description: Implement main dashboard with real-time step counter display, activity history with daily/weekly views, interactive charts using fl_chart, and pull-to-refresh functionality

stories.title: Add charting dependencies
stories.description: Add fl_chart, intl for date formatting, pull_to_refresh to pubspec.yaml

stories.title: Create steps remote data source
stories.description: Implement StepsRemoteDataSource for all steps API endpoints

stories.title: Create steps use cases
stories.description: Implement GetTodayStepsUseCase, GetWeeklyTrendUseCase, GetHourlyPeaksUseCase, GetStatsUseCase, RecordStepsUseCase

stories.title: Create steps state management
stories.description: Implement StepsProvider and StepsState for managing step data

stories.title: Create step counter widgets
stories.description: Implement StepCounterCard with animated number, DailyProgressRing with circular progress

stories.title: Create chart widgets
stories.description: Implement WeeklyChart bar chart and HourlyChart line chart using fl_chart

stories.title: Create stats and activity widgets
stories.description: Implement StatsSummaryCard and ActivityListItem for displaying user statistics

stories.title: Create dashboard page
stories.description: Implement main DashboardPage assembling all widgets with pull-to-refresh

stories.title: Create history pages
stories.description: Implement StepHistoryPage with calendar view and StepDetailsPage for daily details

epics.title: Sharing UI - Friends & Social Features
epics.description: Implement social sharing features including friends list, friend requests management, friend search, activity sharing toggle, and viewing friends' step activity

stories.title: Create sharing and users data sources
stories.description: Implement SharingRemoteDataSource and UsersRemoteDataSource for API calls

stories.title: Create sharing use cases
stories.description: Implement all sharing-related use cases for CRUD operations

stories.title: Create sharing state management
stories.description: Implement SharingProvider and SharingState for managing relationships

stories.title: Create sharing UI widgets
stories.description: Implement FriendListTile, FriendRequestCard, UserSearchTile, FriendActivityCard, SharingStatusBadge

stories.title: Create friends list page
stories.description: Implement FriendsPage showing accepted friends with their status

stories.title: Create friend requests page
stories.description: Implement FriendRequestsPage with incoming and outgoing requests tabs

stories.title: Create user search page
stories.description: Implement SearchUsersPage with debounced search and send request action

stories.title: Create friend activity pages
stories.description: Implement FriendActivityPage and FriendDetailPage for viewing friends' steps

epics.title: Goals UI - Groups & Shared Goals
epics.description: Implement group goals feature including goal creation, invitation system, goal progress tracking, member contributions view, and leaderboard rankings
followsPatterns: Date range picker for goal dates

stories.title: Create goals remote data source
stories.description: Implement GoalsRemoteDataSource for all goals API endpoints

stories.title: Create goals use cases
stories.description: Implement all goals-related use cases for CRUD and member operations

stories.title: Create goals state management
stories.description: Implement GoalsProvider and GoalsState for managing goal data

stories.title: Create goals UI widgets
stories.description: Implement GoalCard, GoalProgressBar, GoalMemberTile, GoalInvitationCard, LeaderboardEntry, GoalDatePicker

stories.title: Create goals list page
stories.description: Implement GoalsListPage showing active and completed goals

stories.title: Create goal creation page
stories.description: Implement CreateGoalPage with form for title, description, target, dates

stories.title: Create goal detail page
stories.description: Implement GoalDetailPage showing goal info, members, and actions

stories.title: Create goal invitations page
stories.description: Implement GoalInvitationsPage for managing pending invitations

stories.title: Create goal progress and leaderboard pages
stories.description: Implement GoalProgressPage and GoalLeaderboardPage for tracking contributions

epics.title: Native Integration - Health APIs & Pedometer
epics.description: Implement native health integration using health package for reading step data from HealthKit (iOS) and Google Fit/Health Connect (Android), with background sync capability
followsPatterns: health package for cross-platform health data

stories.title: Add health integration dependencies
stories.description: Add health, workmanager, permission_handler packages to pubspec.yaml

stories.title: Create health service abstraction
stories.description: Implement HealthService as wrapper around health package with platform detection

stories.title: Create step reader
stories.description: Implement StepReader for querying step data from HealthKit/Google Fit with date ranges

stories.title: Create background sync service
stories.description: Implement BackgroundSyncService using workmanager for periodic step sync

stories.title: Create health local data source
stories.description: Implement HealthLocalDataSource for caching health data locally

stories.title: Create health use cases
stories.description: Implement ReadStepsUseCase, SyncStepsUseCase, GetHealthPermissionsUseCase

stories.title: Create health state management
stories.description: Implement HealthProvider and HealthState for managing health data and sync status

stories.title: Create health UI widgets
stories.description: Implement HealthConnectionCard, SyncStatusIndicator, PermissionRequestDialog

stories.title: Create health settings page
stories.description: Implement HealthSettingsPage for managing health connections and sync preferences

epics.title: Real-Time Client - WebSocket & Push Notifications
epics.description: Implement WebSocket client for real-time step updates and goal progress, Firebase Cloud Messaging for push notifications, with proper reconnection handling and offline support

stories.title: Add real-time dependencies
stories.description: Add web_socket_channel, firebase_core, firebase_messaging, flutter_local_notifications to pubspec.yaml

stories.title: Create WebSocket service
stories.description: Implement SocketService with connection management, authentication, and event handling

stories.title: Create reconnection handler
stories.description: Implement ReconnectionHandler with exponential backoff and network state detection

stories.title: Create socket data source
stories.description: Implement SocketDataSource for managing real-time data streams

stories.title: Create push notification service
stories.description: Implement PushNotificationService with Firebase Cloud Messaging integration

stories.title: Create local notification service
stories.description: Implement LocalNotificationService for displaying notifications when app is in foreground

stories.title: Create real-time state management
stories.description: Implement SocketProvider and NotificationProvider for managing real-time state

stories.title: Create real-time UI widgets
stories.description: Implement ConnectionStatusIndicator and LiveUpdateBadge for showing real-time status

stories.title: Create notification settings page
stories.description: Implement NotificationSettingsPage for managing notification preferences

stories.title: Update platform configs for notifications
stories.description: Add Firebase and notification permissions to Android and iOS configurations
